Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. It comes packed with features that cater to various needs and preferences, ensuring both functionality and style. Given its unique attributes and the time and resources invested in its creation, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, this product carries an exclusive offer at $145. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity to own something special that aligns with your taste and requirements. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and bring you immense satisfaction. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further details. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
